text: Don't Starve is an action-adventure game. It uses features of a survival horror, set in an open world environment. It is developed and published by Klei Entertainment. The game was released on Microsoft Windows, OS X and Linux through Steam on April 23, 2013. It was released on the PlayStation 4 on January 7, 2014. == Characters == === Wilson === Wilson starts with nothing. Wilson gets tricked by Maxwell, and gets taken into the world of Don't Starve. === Willow === Willow starts with a Lighter, and a teddy bear. Willow is usually used by trolls. Willow came from an orphanage that mysteriously burnt down. The teddy bear is named Bernie. Bernie will attract shadow creatures, has 2,000 health, and does 50 damage per hit. The lighter will, as expected, light things on fire. === Wolfgang === Wolfgang grows mighty when on a full belly, and is a very strong character. He has double damage when on a full stomach. ==References== Category:2013 video games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Game jam video games Category:Indie video games Category:IOS games Category:Linux games Category:MacOS games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Open-world video games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:PlayStation Vita games Category:Single-player video games Category:Survival video games Category:Wii U games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games
title: Don't Starve
